title: Album Page, "Torre dei Turchi, Sienna [sic]", late 19th century
medium: Graphite on very smooth off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric
inscribed: Recto, in graphite, upper right corner (perpendicular to drawing): 112; bottom right corner (perpendicular to drawing): 102; bottom left edge below drawing: Sienna [sic] / Torre dei Turchi.  Various other inscriptions with dimensions throughout sheet. Verso: Palazzo dei Turchi / Sienna [sic].
dimensions: Sheet: 19.9 x 30.6 cm (7 13/16 x 12 1/16 in.), irregular
description: Horizontal sheet tipped vertically into binding illustrating at left a fortified structure with a prominent tower in the Romanesque style.  To the right is another view of the left side of this same building's façade.  Below and to the right of these are a view in section of details of the building's elements.

tombstone.epitaph: Album Page, "Torre dei Turchi, Sienna [sic]", late 19th century.Graphite on very smooth off-white wove paper tipped into binding with fabric. Gift of Mrs. William Greenough. 1943-51-277.
